project.description:
For Trending Analysis of these runs see the DataHunter Trend Analysis
To review the current SLA definitiions see the SLA database list

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: parmExecuteScriptVerificationPassed
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: To run this job to re-load results tick this as true

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: parmExecuteResult
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For manual rerun, endure set to: Execution_OK

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Application
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defines the application name being tested. Impacts directory structure etc.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Granularity
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defines the granularity for jmeter graph reporting. value is in milliseconds

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: eXcludestart
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
(optional) EXclude results at the start of the test for the given number of minutes. Filter eg: -x 10
Leave blank for no exculsion.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: captureperiod
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
(optional) EXclude results at the start of the test for the given number of minutes. Filter eg: -c 60
Leave blank for no exculsion.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: MetricsReportSplit
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
Option to create separate report(s) for metric data:
- 'CreateMetricsReport' - create separate file with all non-txn data, suffixed _METRICS,
- 'SplitByDataType' create a file per datatype, suffixed with _{datatype}.
- 'No' - just put everything in the one output file (this is the program default when if paremeter is not entered)

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ErrorTransactionNaming
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
How to handle txns marked as failed.
- 'Rename' suffixes the failed txn names with '_ERRORED'.
- 'Duplicate' keeps the orignal txn plus adds a '_ERRORED' txn.
- 'No' - just keep original txn name. (this is the program default when if paremeter is not entered)

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: eXcludeResultsWithSub
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
Whether to exclude the 'main' sample Result data for sample Results that have SubResults.
- 'True' exclude main Results (this is the program default when if paremeter is not entered).
- 'False' include main Results.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: eXcludestart
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
(optional) Exclude results at the start of the test for the given number of minutes. Filter eg: -x 10
Leave blank for no exclusion.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: captureperiod
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
(optional) EXclude results at the start of the test for the given number of minutes. Filter eg: -c 60
Leave blank for no exclusion.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/sh echo parmExecuteScriptVerificationPassed=$parmExecuteScriptVerificationPassed echo parmExecuteResult=$parmExecuteResult echo Jmeter results file location generally set to some temp location for verify, so as not to be confused with actual test if [ "$parmExecuteResult" = "Execution_OK" ]; then echo "load results into graphical comparative analysis tooling" cd /var/mark59/metricsRuncheck/target/ # java -jar metricsRuncheck.jar -a $Application -i /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application -h $mysqlserver -p $mysqlPort -t JMETER $eXcludestart $captureperiod -r "run $BUILD_NUMBER" java -jar metricsRuncheck.jar -a $Application -i /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application -d h2tcpclient -h metrics #-t JMETER $eXcludestart $captureperiod -r "run $BUILD_NUMBER" echo convert xml file to csv if [ -d "/var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED" ]; then rm -r /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED fi mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED cd /var/mark59/resultFilesConverter/target/ java -jar resultFilesConverter.jar -i /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application -f${Application}TestResults_converted.csv -m$MetricsReportSplit -e$ErrorTransactionNaming -x$eXcludeResultsWithSub echo run jmeter report generation rm -rf /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application} rm -rf /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_CPU_UTIL rm -rf /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_DATAPOINT rm -rf /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_MEMORY rm -rf /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_METRICS mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application} mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_CPU_UTIL mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_DATAPOINT mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_MEMORY mkdir -p /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/${Application}_METRICS cd $JmeterHomeReportGeneration/bin $JmeterHomeReportGeneration/bin/jmeter -Jjmeter.reportgenerator.overall_granularity=$Granularity -g /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/${Application}/MERGED/DataHunterTestResults_converted.csv -o /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/DataHunter $JmeterHomeReportGeneration/bin/jmeter -Jjmeter.reportgenerator.overall_granularity=$Granularity -g /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/${Application}/MERGED/DataHunterTestResults_converted_CPU_UTIL.csv -o /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/DataHunter_CPU_UTIL $JmeterHomeReportGeneration/bin/jmeter -Jjmeter.reportgenerator.overall_granularity=$Granularity -g /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/${Application}/MERGED/DataHunterTestResults_converted_DATAPOINT.csv -o /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/DataHunter_DATAPOINT $JmeterHomeReportGeneration/bin/jmeter -Jjmeter.reportgenerator.overall_granularity=$Granularity -g /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/${Application}/MERGED/DataHunterTestResults_converted_MEMORY.csv -o /var/Mark59_Runs/htmlreport/DataHunter_MEMORY chmod 777 /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED/${Application}TestResults_converted.csv chmod 777 /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED/${Application}TestResults_converted_CPU_UTIL.csv chmod 777 /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED/${Application}TestResults_converted_DATAPOINT.csv chmod 777 /var/Mark59_Runs/Jmeter_Results/$Application/MERGED/${Application}TestResults_converted_MEMORY.csv fi mailmessage=nothing if [ "$parmExecuteResult" = "Execution_OK" ]; then mailmessage=Scenario_Run_ok fi if [ "$parmExecuteResult" = "Execution_failure" ]; then mailmessage=Scenario_Run_Fail fi if [ "$parmExecuteScriptVerificationPassed" = "false" ]; then mailmessage=Script_verify_failure fi BEGINMAIL$mailmessage$ENDMAIL if [ "$parmExecuteResult" = "Execution_OK" ]; then exit 0 fi if [ "$parmExecuteResult" = "Execution_failure" ]; then exit 1 fi if [ "$parmExecuteScriptVerificationPassed" = "false" ]; then exit 1 fi # $SHELL
